Address.label: Address
Address.value: 35 CAMBRIDGEPARK DRIVE,4TH FLOOR, CAMBRIDGE, Massachusetts, 02140, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Syros Pharmaceuticals Inc is a biopharmaceutical company engaged in a non-coding regulatory region of the genome controlling the activation and repression of genes. It is primarily involved in the segments of the pharmaceutical, biotechnology, and other related markets that address gene control and cancer. The Company operates only in the United States.
